name: Casebook Episode 3: Snake in the Grass
name_original: Casebook Episode 3: Snake in the Grass
description:
Casebook Episode 3: Snake in the Grass is an adventure game developed by Clocktower Games. It came out on 13-11-2009. Areo Cinematic Games published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Casebook Episode 3: Snake in the Grass is available on PC.
